analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol:
	Contract MYTCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol#158-162)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in CommonSale.calculateAndMintTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol#621-655):
	External calls:
	- mintTokens(to,tokens) (/unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol#646-647)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stages (/unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol#651-652)
	- stages (/unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol#655)
	- totalInvested (/unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol#649-651)

CommonSale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol#661-664) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,tokens) (/unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol#661-662)
	-token.transfer(to,tokens) (/unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol#663)

CommonSale.retrieveExternalTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol#677-685) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-alienToken.transfer(to,alienToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol#683-685)

Tge.endSale (/unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol#891-903) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/21/0xc0360a3507655e619cdf7e6ca616d9ddec4dec95.sol#1): it allows old versions
